title: Caritas Hellas
subtitle:
#CaritasHellas expresses concern over xenophobic reactions against #refugees. The #RacistViolenceRecordingNetwork has witnessed an increasing number of xenophobic and racist incidents, targeting the transfers of #asylum seekers to reception facilities.

title: Syria Relief
subtitle:
We are running vocational #training and #livelihood projects across #Turkey to help #Syrian #refugees and the host community gain the skills they need to find employment and improve their quality of life. 
Help to support these projects, donate now http://syriarelief.org.uk/donation pic.twitter.com/CApa4Wot4j
